I'm so happy with this hat! It's so well made with great detail. This is worth the price for sure and I would buy this again.
Love this hat so much!!! Incredible value. I got a lot of compliments. Fits great and I’ll be wearing it for years to come.

评论概述: Detailed and Will Make Your Entire Costume
评论详情: This is stunning. It’s sturdy and the details and design are intricate and spot on steam punk. The large fit was great for my husband. He doesn’t enjoy dressing up for Halloween, but with this piece; I convinced him to accompany me on the annual “Witches Night Out”: a crawl and shop that benefits small businesses. He tells me that it is very comfortable and if this is what it takes to get him to wear a costume: it’s great!!!! A wonderful piece.
Fits large heads. Unique and not "cheap" looking
Exactly as pictured. Good quality and came packaged very well. Received many compliments at office party.
I would not recommend purchasing this hat. Very poorly put together cheaply made and not worth the $30 that you pay for it save your time and money do not order.

评论概述: Didn’t came with the cute metal thing near the feathers
评论详情: I love the hat but it didn’t came with the cute design that’s on the side of the hat like in the pictures a little disappointed in that but it’s still a good hat. I will give it a 4/5 since it didn’t came with it.

I bought this hat to wear during STEAM (Science, Tech, Engineering, Art, and Math) Time at the library. The kids love the hat! The goggles can be carefully removed and have real glass lenses. Definitely not safety goggles, but I was not expecting them to be a separate piece. It was a pleasant surprise! All of the little decorative bits and pieces have stayed on through two years of programming and being tossed around. The programs last an hour or two, which is about the amount of time I can wear this hat comfortably. The hat is a standard size and I have a medium sized head. I’d say it fits pretty well, but the hat is oval shaped and I have a round head, though, so after about two hours of wearing it it starts to rub. I get a funny little red mark in the middle of my forehead…But it is well worth it for the smiles and fun!
Definitely low quality but it came in a box undamaged. Looks like a beginner made it but it will work for the purpose

Very nice hat, well made. My only complaint is the tint on the goggles is so dark, will only wear for pictures.

ARBA (American Rabbit Breeders Association) National Convention fell over Halloween weekend. Needed an appropriate “costume” that wouldn’t hinder running back and forth to the show table. This hat was perfect! Fit was a bit big but I have a small head. Just made a ponytail so it would be more snug. The ears weren’t perky when I pulled out of the box, so on the drive across the country I make sure they were stored where I wanted them to be. One was perfect, the other side was weak and a DQ but that made for more conversations. Overall- it got TONS of compliments and I’ll absolutely be using this if Convention ever falls on Halloween again.
